name: Suspicious Control Panel DLL Load
description: Detects suspicious Rundll32 execution from control.exe as used by Equation Group and Exploit Kits
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.parent.executable:*\\System32\\control.exe AND process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe\ ) AND (NOT (process.command_line:*Shell32.dll*)))`
